com.plusauth.android.customtabs

Class CustomTabsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.browser.customtabs.CustomTabsServiceConnection
      • com.plusauth.android.customtabs.CustomTabsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ServiceConnection

    public class CustomTabsController
extends androidx.browser.customtabs.CustomTabsServiceConnection
    Class for dealing with CustomTabsServiceConnection in an easier manner.
